name: Outside (itch) (riks, vcroteau)
description:
Get LOST in this secret idyllic environment you've FOUND 

(hehe haha teehee hoho)

Use Controller or Mouse and Keyboard!

Press Square or E to turn on the Radio!

Kris Camp - Level Design, 3D Modelling, Special Effects, Programming

Tori Croteau- Level Design, Special Effects, Programming

Made for Global Game Jam 2021!

Used free assets from:

Simple nature pack (rock models, twig models and stump model):

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/low-poly-simple...

Fantasy sky pack (Skybox):

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/fantasy-skybox-f...
